mapper.select: SELECT id, region_id, title, description, link_url, category_code, latitude, longitude, address, is_active, view_count, created_at, updated_at FROM tourist_spots WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, region_id, title, description, link_url, category_code, latitude, longitude, address, is_active, view_count, created_at, updated_at FROM tourist_spots WHERE region_id = #{regionId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, region_id, title, description, link_url, category_code, latitude, longitude, address, is_active, view_count, created_at, updated_at FROM tourist_spots WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tourist_spots (region_id, title, description, link_url, category_code, latitude, longitude, address, is_active, view_count) VALUES (#{regionId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{linkUrl}, #{categoryCode}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, #{isActive}, #{viewCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE tourist_spots SET region_id = #{regionId}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, link_url = #{linkUrl}, category_code = #{categoryCode}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, address = #{address}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE id = #{id}
